thread.section_title: LiftMode Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LiftMode | liftmode.com
thread.title: DANIEL

author: DANIEL
title: DANIEL
text: It took a few times of taking this product to find the right dose and for my body to respond the way it was advertised, but after a few tries it ended up being a great experience. Great to the point where I had to force myself to not take it more than the two days a week they recommend. This is my first phenibut experience so I have no frame of reference to base my review on, but 3 capsules which equaled about .9 grams seemed to be perfect. 5 was too strong and 2 was ok but not as good as 3.
